author: MiniWarGaming
description:
Skari and Luka have been itching to do a new season of Legion Lockdown, and 11th Edition 40K can’t come soon enough. So we decided to go back to our childhood editions and and mix them up a bit to bring you guys a new season of the Legion Lockdown. 

Check out the Depths of Perdition here
https://www.miniwargaming.com/perdition

In collaboration with Skari from Skaredcast - http://patreon.com/skaredcast

*Important Links*
MWG Forge:  https://forge.miniwargaming.com (3D Printed Terrain and Minis)
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/miniwargaming
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/miniwargaming
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/miniwargaming
MiniWarGamer Dave:  https://www.youtube.com/@MWG_Dave
title: Legion Lockdown Classical Edition | Warhammer 40K 4th Edition Battle Report Ep 1

author: MiniWarGaming
description:
Find out more at MiniWarGaming.com/perdition

Designed with narrative tabletop gaming in mind, the Depths of Perdition offers a modular interior system perfect for starships, bunkers, research sites, and industrial zones. No matter how you arrange it, the terrain creates a believable space loaded with tension and thematic depth.

Using precise six-inch tiles, the set assembles into detailed corridors and rooms that can be rebuilt in moments. Stretch out long hallways, twist narrow tunnels, open up control rooms, or stack levels into multi-floor structures. All components are designed to print support-free and integrate with future add-ons.
title: Delve into the Depths of Perdition
